title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/open-in-external-app
author: LinOnetwo
name: Open in External App
description: (Requires TidGi) A toolbar button to open PDF tiddler in os default reader.
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tiddlywiki-plugins/tree/master/plugins/linonetwo/open-in-external-app">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tiddlywiki-plugins/tree/master/plugins/linonetwo/open-in-external-app"/></$button>

After you import a PDF or image file into your wiki, you can open that tiddler, and click on the button to open that file in external PDF viewer or image reader.

Note that if you use this to open a `.tid` or `.md` file, and edit it, things won't change in the wiki, because the tiddlywiki currently doesn't reload changed files from the disk.
